doc.title: Boobs: An American Obsession
doc.plot: Merriam-Webster defines the breast as "either of the pair of mammary glands extending from the front of the chest in adult human females." So if that's all they are, what's the big deal? Why are we so captivated by this particular form of fatty tissue? "Boobs: An American Obsession" is a revealing, humorous, often poignant investigation involving everyone from anthropologists to porn stars as we explore our culture's fascination with breasts.
